data.title: Eastern Kentucky University
data.meta_description: Eastern Kentucky University offers excellent education, convenient housing, competitive financial aid, & abundant student life experiences.
data.text:


Find Your Scholarship



Apply Today



Free Books for All

Discover your true calling at EKU. Choose from a variety of in-demand and nationally recognized academic programs, from associate to doctoral degrees.

The School of Opportunity

At Eastern Kentucky University, we take pride in providing an excellent educational experience for students from all walks of life. With comfortable and convenient campus housing options, competitive financial aid packages, and an abundance of student life experiences, you are sure to find your place at EKU.

Virtual Tour

Experience EKU at your convenience using our Virtual Tour. You’ll find information about campus housing, academic buildings, athletic facilities and so much more. After taking the virtual tour, be sure to schedule a time to visit campus and apply for admission.

First-Generation College Students

Student-to-Faculty

EKU Stories

Welcome to EKU: A Freshman’s Guide to Fall Semester

As summer wraps up, EKU is preparing for the arrival of new students for the Fall semester. Here are some essential dates and tips.

EKU Addresses Kentucky’s Nursing Shortage

With Kentucky currently facing noticeable healthcare professional shortages in almost every county, Eastern Kentucky University is constantly working to meet workforce needs by providing skilled graduates.

Top Reasons to Earn a Business Degree from EKU

Get a game-changing business degree at EKU. Choose from high-demand programs, take advantage of real-world experiences, and get access to a network of opportunities.

Spring 2024 Commencement

Congratulations Spring 2024 graduates! We celebrated 2,217 graduates during three commencement ceremonies on Friday, May 10th. Classmates, friends, and families gathered in Alltech Arena at The Kentucky Horse Park to honor graduates from EKU’s six academic colleges. Graduates — welcome to the Eternal Colonels family!

EKU's Master of Business Administration

EKU’s Master of Business Administration program is a game changer for career advancement.

As the School of Opportunity, EKU focuses on creating well-rounded professionals and individuals. Students in EKU’s MBA program learn from industry experts with real-world experience and deep knowledge of the current business world.

Ten years after graduation, EKU business master’s graduates earn median wages of more than $95,000 in Kentucky, according to KYSTATS.

Set yourself apart with an MBA degree from EKU – on campus or 100% online.

Learn more about EKU’s MBA program.
